attributes.action: ensure that the discredited and disgraced former prime-minister Anthony Charles Lynton Blair and  his Spin-Doctor, the discredited Alastair John Campbell will be tried for War Crimes against the Iraqi peoples and that their trial for said War Crimes will be held at the Hague
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
